name: Crunch Week
description:
Goal: 

Complete enough work to get through the week!

How to play: 

Click the tasks before they get to the bottom of the screen. Tasks are only clickable on green areas, and will give you double the points if you procrastinate and click them in the blue area!

Failing to complete tasks before they disappear will make you lose health.

Golden tasks give double points, but also make you lose double the health if you fail.

Credits:

Music is from Incompetech
